column1: This privacy policy is for the test phase of our app and sets out how we collect
column3: and protect the personal information of our users during this phase.

column1: Personal Information We Collect During the test phase of our app
column2: we may collect personal information from you
column5: and device information. We collect this information to provide you with the app's features and to improve our testing program.

column1: How We Use Your Personal Information We use the personal information we collect from you during the test phase of our app for the following purposes:
•	To provide you with access to the app's features and functionality.
•	To communicate with you about the app and any updates or changes to the test program.
•	To improve the app's performance and functionality based on your feedback.
We will not use your personal information for any other purposes or share it with third parties.
How We Protect Your Personal Information We take the security of your personal information seriously and implement appropriate measures to protect it. However
column2: please be aware that no security measures can provide absolute protection against unauthorized access

column1: Data Retention We will retain your personal information for the duration of the test phase of our app. After the test phase is completed
column2: we will delete all personal information we have collected from you.

column1: Changes to this Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. We encourage you to review this policy regularly to stay informed of our privacy practices.
Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or our use of your personal information during the test phase of our app
column2: please contact us at [insert contact information]."
the developer is informing users about the personal information they may collect during the test phase of the app
column3: how that information will be used
column4: and how it will be protected. They're also outlining the data retention policy and providing contact information for users to ask any questions or raise concerns.
